channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apparently, Edgar Wright Turned Down Directing an ‘X-Men’ Movie
item.description: 'Running Man' and 'Star Wars' producer Simon Kinberg revealed his desire to work with the director on the superhero franchise.

item.title: VCs abandon old rules for a ‘funky time’ of investing in AI startups
item.description: The goalposts are moving for AI startups when it comes to growth, product features and just about everything else.

item.title: Don’t wait for Black Friday - Elegoo Saturn 4 Ultra 3D printer delivers next-level 16K precision printing for just $419.99
item.description: Elegoo Saturn 4 Ultra 3D printer delivers next-level 16K precision printing - and it's just $419.99 for Black Friday.

item.title: Scientists Wanted to Know How Many Squid Pilot Whales Eat Each Day. What They Found Was Astounding
item.description: Short-finned pilot whales love eating squid, and boy do they stuff themselves with it, new research finds.

item.title: The future of hatchbacks? Peugeot's new concept EV dazzles with gullwing doors, swappable seats and steer-by-wire tech
item.description: Peugeot says it is moving towards steer-by-wire technology in the coming years, completely changing the way it approaches car interiors.

item.title: The best instant cameras you can buy right now
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday doesn’t officially take place until Friday, November 28th; however, if you want to shop ahead of time, we’ve rounded up the best early Black Friday deals you can already get. Even with the ability to take excellent photos with our phones and instantly share them across the world, there’s something magical about the old-school […]...

item.title: Apple TV is getting MLS games at no extra cost
item.description: Starting with the 2026 Major League Soccer (MLS) season, “all MLS matches” will be available to Apple TV subscribers “at no additional cost,” Apple and the MLS announced today. Since the 2023 MLS season, streaming MLS games has required an MLS Season Pass subscription, which was available on its own or for a discount for […]

item.title: ‘Oz the Great and Powerful’ Hasn’t Aged Well
item.description: ‘Wicked: For Good’ and ‘The Wizard of Oz’ at the Sphere mean the ‘Oz’ story is hotter than ever, but this 2013 film occupies an uneasy place in its legacy.

item.title: 5 Years Later, the PS5 Has Destroyed Xbox. But the PS6 Faces a Bigger Threat
item.description: Sony won this console generation. The next one won't be so easy.

item.title: Starlink rival ‘Project Kuiper’ rebrands to Amazon Leo
item.description: After several successful launches this year, Project Kuiper has its official name: Amazon Leo. It’s a nod to the term Low-Earth Orbit (LEO), which refers to orbits at an altitude of 1,200 miles (2,000 kilometers) or less. That’s the region where Amazon’s constellation of 153 satellites orbit. The original code name referred to the Kuiper […]

item.title: Lina Khan Stays Remarkably on Message on ‘The Adam Friedland Show’
item.description: Friedland simply could not get her to disclose her LSAT score.

item.title: SoftBank sells its entire Nvidia stock - could this be the start of the AI bubble bursting?
item.description: SoftBank sells Nvidia shares to fund OpenAI and robotics investment, raising market concerns amid AI bubble warnings.

item.title: The best gifts for pets (and their parents): 30+ ideas that the internet and Mashable reporters stand by
item.description: Looking for Christmas gifts for pet parents? We found guaranteed hits, including useful gifts for dog owners, unique cat scratchers, and toys they'll love.

item.title: Baffled by the iPhone Pocket? Here are 5 reasons why Apple's ridiculed phone ‘sock’ actually makes sense
item.description: The iPhone Pocket has been largely ridiculed on social media, but there's more thought behind it than meets the eye.

item.title: 21 Best MagSafe Accessories (2025): Qi2 Chargers, Magnetic Wallets, and More
item.description: The weird, wonderful world of MagSafe accessories (Qi2 included) can make your phone feel modular. These are our favorites.

item.title: Blue Origin sticks first New Glenn rocket landing and launches NASA spacecraft
item.description: It's an impressive accomplishment for the new mega-rocket launch system, and paves the way for the company to start re-using the boosters in commercial missions.

item.title: Build Mode starts at the beginning: How Forethought AI found product-market fit
item.description: In the debut episode of the Build Mode podcast, we sat down with Deon Nicholas, co-founder of Forethought AI, to unpack what it really takes to build a lasting company with and for your customers from day one.

item.title: Report: Brainiac Will Be the Big Bad in ‘Man of Tomorrow’
item.description: James Gunn's 'Superman' follow-up will allegedly tackle one of the Man of Steel's most famous foes.
